nodes.name: newTokenAndInstance
newToken

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract Kernel,contract ACL,address[] memory,uint256[] memory,uint64[3] memory) returns (contract Voting)

nodes.name: newInstance

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract Kernel,contract MiniMeToken,uint64[3] memory) returns (contract Voting)

nodes.name: newTokenAndInstance
newToken

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract Kernel,contract ACL,address[] memory,uint256[] memory,uint64[3] memory) returns (contract Voting)

nodes.name: newInstance

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract Kernel,contract MiniMeToken,uint64[3] memory) returns (contract Voting)

newInstance(address[],uint256[],uint64[3.details: Deploy a Template DAO using a previously cached MiniMe token

params._stakes: Array of token stakes for holders (token has 18 decimals, multiply token amount `* 10^18`)
params._votingSettings: Array of [supportRequired, minAcceptanceQuorum, voteDuration] to set up the voting app of the organization

newToken(string,string).details: Create a new MiniMe token and cache it for the user

params._name: String with the name for the token used by share holders in the organization
params._symbol: String with the symbol for the token used by share holders in the organization

newTokenAndInstance(string,string,addres.details: Create a new MiniMe token and deploy a Template DAO.

params._stakes: Array of token stakes for holders (token has 18 decimals, multiply token amount `* 10^18`)
params._tokenName: String with the name for the token used by share holders in the organization
params._tokenSymbol: String with the symbol for the token used by share holders in the organization
params._votingSettings: Array of [supportRequired, minAcceptanceQuorum, voteDuration] to set up the voting app of the organization
